card.name: Zabi Claw, Dark Warrior
card.text: ■ This creature attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Death Hands, Misfortune Emperor
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

card.name: The Black V, Roaring Sound
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Speed Attacker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, your opponent chooses and discards a card.

card.name: Bloodgear, Rainbow Dash
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Each turn, you may have the first darkness or fire creature you summon cost 1 less. It can't cost 0 or less.

card.name: Bakugetto, Totsugeki Tank
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.

card.name: Jack Alcadeias, Dark Gaia
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Slayer ■ When you put this creature, destroy one of your opponent's cards that costs 4 or less.

card.name: Jaouga, Onigaoni
card.text: ■ Onitime ■ Speed Attacker ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a non-evolution darkness or fire creature that costs 7 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone.

card.name: Kizugui Henge
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, put one of your shields into your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield. ■ Onitime

card.name: Tsuruhashi Doji
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Slayer ■ When you put this creature, put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then you may return a creature from your graveyard to your hand. ■ Onitime

card.name: Assault, Onifuda Kingdom!
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of the following. :► Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that costs 8 or less. :► Put a creature that costs 8 or less from your graveyard. ■ Onitime
